Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Six Minuets, D 2D

1811

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 13' 30"

  • 1. C major
  • 2. F major
  • 4. C major
  • 5. D minor
  • 6. B-flat major

Schubert wrote two versions of these dances: one for winds, of which nos. 1–3 are extant, and one over two staves that can be played at the piano, of which nos. 1–2 and 4–6 are extant. The latter includes two versions, one incomplete, of the trio of no. 6.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VI/9 · BA 5534 · Tänze für mehrere Instrumente · ed. Doris Finke-Hecklinger / Werner Aderhold [including version for winds]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50022 · Sämtliche Tänze für Klavier / Band 2 · ed. Alexander Weinmann [nos. 1–2]

1. C major

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

2. F major

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

4. C major

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

5. D minor

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

6. B-flat major

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
